faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a Shop For Sale in Sector 45
faqSection.description: We address the most common queries investors have regarding commercial real estate purchasing costs and long-term viability in prime Gurugram locations.

faqs.question: What is the typical rental yield I can expect from a commercial shop in Sector 45 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Commercial properties generally offer significantly higher rental yields than residential properties. In Sector 45 a well-located ground floor shop can typically generate a gross rental yield ranging between 55% to 75% per annum depending on the tenant type lease duration and the exact location within the sector. Spaces near main roads or in established markets command the highest yields due to guaranteed foot traffic and brand visibility.

faqs.question: Are all commercial shops in Sector 45 RERA registered and verified
faqs.answer: While established standalone shops may predate RERA all new commercial projects and units listed on our platform are thoroughly vetted for RERA compliance occupancy certificates and clear title deeds. We only present opportunities that have undergone strict legal scrutiny minimizing investor risk and ensuring a smooth, secure transaction process.

faqs.question: What are the common extra charges or hidden costs when buying a commercial shop
faqs.answer: Beyond the basic sale price buyers should budget for stamp duty and registration fees which are mandatory government charges. Additionally costs may include maintenance deposits or security fees payable to the developer or Resident Welfare Association property tax liabilities and potential fit-out charges if the unit is delivered in a shell condition. Our team provides a transparent breakdown of all costs upfront.

faqs.question: How does connectivity impact the value of a Shop For Sale in Sector 45
faqs.answer: Connectivity is paramount for commercial value. Shops located near the Huda City Centre metro station or those with easy access to NH-48 or the Golf Course Extension Road are valued higher because they draw customers from a wider geographic area. Superior connectivity ensures both customer convenience and efficient supply chain logistics maximizing the potential profitability of the retail unit.

faqs.question: Is it better to buy a ready-to-move-in shop or an under-construction commercial unit
faqs.answer: The choice depends on your investment goal. Ready-to-move-in shops offer immediate possession and immediate rental income but come at a higher capital cost. Under-construction units are typically cheaper offering better capital appreciation potential but involve waiting periods and inherent construction risks. Sector 45 offers robust options in both categories catering to various risk appetites.

faqs.question: What kind of businesses typically thrive in the Sector 45 commercial area
faqs.answer: Due to the high-density residential and corporate population Sector 45 is ideal for upscale services such as fine dining restaurants specialty grocery stores high-end salons banking services and convenience retail. Businesses catering to the professional working population and affluent families tend to perform exceptionally well here.

faqs.question: Can foreign nationals or NRIs purchase a commercial shop in Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes non-resident Indians (NRIs) and persons of Indian origin (PIOs) are permitted to purchase commercial property in India without special permissions under the FEMA Act. However foreign nationals must adhere to specific RBI guidelines and may require prior approval depending on the nature of the transaction. We offer specialized guidance for overseas investors.

faqs.question: What is the average size range for retail shops available in this sector
faqs.answer: The size range is highly varied reflecting market demand. Small kiosk units might start from 150 square feet. Standard retail shops typically fall between 400 to 1200 square feet while large anchor stores or double-height showrooms can exceed 5000 square feet offering flexible options for diverse retail needs in Sector 45.

faqs.question: How important is parking availability for commercial property value
faqs.answer: Parking availability is extremely important especially in a high-density urban area like Sector 45. Shops within complexes that offer ample dedicated multi-level or basement parking are far more attractive to both tenants and customers leading to higher rents and better capital value retention compared to shops with limited street parking.

faqs.answer: While not legally required using an expert commercial real estate professional is highly recommended.
